base.name: Comparator
base.description: Compares two inputs using a given comparison operator and returns true or false.

parameter_definitions.name: operator
parameter_definitions.description: Indicates the comparison operator to use: input[0] <op> input[1].

parameter_definitions.name: atol
parameter_definitions.description: Absolute tolerance for math.isclose ('==' and '!=' operators only)

parameter_definitions.name: rtol
parameter_definitions.description: Relative tolerance for math.isclose ('==' and '!=' operators only)
